name: My heart is a liar and it wont shut up
name_original: My heart is a liar and it wont shut up
description:
This game was made in 72 hours for minijam 68 with the theme of SLEEP and limitation of NO TEXT.

controls: A and D to move, space to jump and S to sleep. Your heart rate will increase as you move, sleep to calm it down.

Survive your greatest fears: that which lurks in the dark and your own heart.

note: im doing this very late, i will try to update with more builds for mac etc
